display_long_description:
**Angelino Drift** is an open-world driving sandbox set in the dark, neon-lit streets of Angelino City. 

Every day, a live bomb is hidden somewhere in the city, and **it’s up to you to find it before time runs out.**

You play as sharp-tongued Marie and her new driver, tearing through the city at full speed. 

# "Drifting is the core of everything you do!"

[media]

Slide through corners to maintain momentum, shoot enemy vehicles, and smash through traffic and obstacles without taking damage. 

**While drifting, your car becomes unstoppable, turning the city itself into a weapon.**

This is a game about control versus chaos. Drive clean to stay alive, or embrace destruction to clear your path. **Every second counts**, every corner matters, and hesitation is the fastest way to fail.

If you love open-world driving, stylish drifting, explosive shooting, and sandbox freedom, **Angelino Drift** delivers a tight, adrenaline-charged experience where momentum is survival.

[media]
